description: The field includes medical diagnosis and treatment of congenital heart defects, coronary artery disease, heart failure, valvular heart disease and electrophysiology.

A gynecologist diagnose and treat issues related to the female reproductive tract. This includes the uterus, fallopian tubes, and ovaries and breasts. Anyone with female organs may see a gynecologist.
Concerns the diagnosis and treatment of kidney diseases, including electrolyte disturbances and hypertension,renal replacement, including dialysis and renal transplant patients.
Focus on the digestive tract and the gallbladder, liver, bile ducts, and pancreas. Also do routine procedures such as colonoscopies, which look at the inside of your colon.
Orthopedics is a branch of medicine that focuses on the care of the musculoskeletal system. This system is made up of muscles and bones, as well as joints, ligaments, and tendons.
The Department of Neurology at grace-clinic offers a depth and breadth of surgical experience that few institutions can match. More than 20 full-time clinical and research faculty.
